requestAdditionalImaging


void requestAdditionalImaging(java.lang.String barcode,
                              java.util.Calendar date)
                              throws BusinessException



    
a User request to have extra imaging session on a plate.
    

    

    

    

        
Parameters:

        
barcode - the barcode of the plate

        
date - the date by which the user would like their
        imaging to happen

        
Throws:

        
BusinessException
        - if an error

    

    








findAdditionalImagingRequests


java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Calendar> findAdditionalImagingRequests()
                                                                                 throws BusinessException



    
Get a list of all the additional imaging requests received.
    

    

    

    


        
Returns:

        
the list of barcodes and times requested

        
Throws:

        
BusinessException

    

    








removeAdditionalImaging


void removeAdditionalImaging(java.lang.String barcode)
                             throws BusinessException



    
remove the additional imaging request from the queue - in reality
    it will probably be useful to keep all requests, just marking them complete
    once they are done (thus allowing us to note if the system is being abused
    

    

    

    

        
Parameters:

        
barcode - the barcode of the plate imaged

        
Throws:

        
BusinessException
        - on an error

    

    








requestPlateRetrieval


void requestPlateRetrieval(java.lang.String barcode,
                           java.util.Calendar dueDate)
                           throws BusinessException



    
A user may request to retrieve a plate from the storage device in
    order to, for example, take it on a synchrotron trip, or look at it under a
    microscope, etc.
    

    

    

    

        
Parameters:

        
barcode - the barcode of the plate

        
dueDate - the date by which the plate has to be
        taken out.

        
Throws:

        
BusinessException

    

    








findPlateRetrievals


java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Calendar> findPlateRetrievals()
                                                                       throws BusinessException



    
Get a list of the plates that have been requested to be taken out
    of the store.
    

    

    

    


        
Returns:

        
the list of plates and a time by which they should be taken out
        

        
Throws:

        
BusinessException
        - on an error

    

    








removePlateRetrievalRequest


void removePlateRetrievalRequest(java.lang.String barcode)
                                 throws BusinessException



    
remove the plate from the list of plates that have been requested
    to be withdrawn from the storage unit. In reality it will probably be useful
    to keep all requests, just marking them complete once they are done (thus
    allowing us to note if the system is being abused.
    

    

    

    

        
Parameters:

        
barcode -

        
Throws:

        
BusinessException
